categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Ahrman was a group of three Lambda-class T-4a shuttles used by the Rebel Alliance. The shuttles arrived to fight a single TIE Interceptor and TIE Bombers but were all destroyed by the Imperial fighters. The events surrounding the shuttles was then used in the Combat chamber to train future pilots, one of them was Maarek Stele.
